name: USX-1944
description:
Made in ~a week for the Awful Winter Jam 2018: http://www.awfuljams.com/winter-2018

A run-and-sword game where you fight your way through 4 blood-pumping levels until finally facing the ultimate boss of all the robots!

Features:

  • Sword! Spin! Slide!
  • FOUR difficulty settings! Easy, Normal, Hard and Nightmare!
  • Gamepad controls!
  • Programmer art intermixed with some actual good art!
  • Public domain chiptune music!

Default Controls

  • Z: Attack
  • X: Jump
  • C: Dash (also down + jump)

Gamepad is supported!
